name: Neuron Game
description:
Neuron is a new puzzle game. It combines tasks on logic, spatial thinking, mathematical calculations, memory and coordination of movements. Flexible and varied situations will require you to make both informed and thoughtful decisions, as well as quick and accurate actions.

Go through all the levels and collect lost memory shards. Reveal all their secrets and find the answer to the main question. What is Neuron?

 Experiment. Remember. Look for the right answers.

 Features:

- 30 different levels requiring attention and lateral thinking to complete.

- Simple and intuitive gameplay combined with depth of tasks.

- High quality effects and realistic visual style.

- Partial gamepad support

- Supported languages: English, Russian.
